nodes.text: Bevell Three was the third planet in the Bevell system. Jai Raventhorn led a Rebel team to this planet to capture four Imperial agents, but the mission was compromised: only Jai escaped. The four Infiltrators commandos who died included Leong. As a propaganda measure rather than a reward, Jai was promoted to Master Sergeant.
Bevell was a common name amongst male Corellians.
